meanings.definition: A division of a family or clan.
meanings.sent1: In our family, we belong to different septs based on our ancestors.
meanings.sent2: The clan has several septs, each with its own traditions and customs.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the septs competed in friendly games to show their unity.
meanings.sent4: The septs of the clan are like branches of a tree, all connected by the same roots.
meanings.sent5: The septs of the family are like puzzle pieces that fit together to form a complete picture.

meanings.sent1: There were septs of students waiting in line to enter the museum.
meanings.sent2: The team was divided into septs to work on different aspects of the project.
meanings.sent3: The septs of friends decided to go on a road trip together.
meanings.sent4: The septs of geese flew in perfect formation across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The septs of colors in the rainbow create a beautiful spectrum.

meanings.definition: A division of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The city council discussed the development plans for the different septs of the town.
meanings.sent2: Each sept of the city has its own unique character and charm.
meanings.sent3: The septs of the town were decorated with colorful banners for the festival.
meanings.sent4: The septs of the city are like pieces of a jigsaw puzzle, fitting together to form the whole.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the septs of the town allows you to discover hidden gems and local treasures.
